website_summaries.verdict: A soft, high-quality towel in a versatile size.
pros: Parents and caregivers praise the softness, large size, and thickness of these towels
Some mention the quality construction and stitching as well
We love the cute animal theme
Stand out for being very absorbent
cons: Quality control could be improved – some customers reported the towel wasn't as soft as expected or didn't hold up well over time

customer_reviews.title: Where are the wild things?
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels. First of all the price is great and the quality is wonderful. The stitching is consistent and finished well. The towel is soft and absorbent. Who doesn't love a little bundle of joy with an animal head. I use these as a topper for diaper cakes. I will be purchasing other animals in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great towel!!! It's big enough it will last a long time for baby to use
customer_reviews.author: Emilyray

customer_reviews.title: Thick Material and Great Size!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these towels!! They are very thick (but soft) and the perfect size to wrap up my baby after his bath. (I have a 10-month-old). I also love that they have a hood, of course, to keep baby's head warm. I've used other towels for my son before, but they were all super thin and too small compared to these. I currently have the giraffe, elephant, and the cute little fox. I think these towels will still be great even when my son is a toddler. You can't find these types of towels at another store for the same price. I would definitely recommend these to any other mom for their baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS BRAND- We ♥️ Hudson! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Adore this towel! Perfect size. Very plush towel compared to the other baby/ toddler ones I’ve bought! Will definitely buy more! Love this brand. Best quality for the price. Buy this towel- forget about the other ones. You want this brand. Over sized for my 2 year old- and he loves it! Runs about with the hood on and the towel trailing behind like a majestic cape of adorable. I think it would fit newborn up to 5y/o kids. Beautifully packaged with a hanger, a bow. Ready-to-gift!
customer_reviews.author: Creeper

customer_reviews.title: so soft and cute! I have washed it but ...
customer_reviews.text: so soft and cute! I have washed it but haven't used it yet. It is hanging on my daughters nursery door waiting for her arrival!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: I was trying to find some extra cute items for ...
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find some extra cute items for a friend who is expecting her 4th boy and this was an item that I thought was cuter than average. I was worried about the quality but it is well made, no loose threads and the material is not rough. It is fairly thick and soft and was very well received by my friend. Shipping was quick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ph0sPh0r

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These towels are so much better than the ones we originally ordered. Soft, large and durable, drying our three month old is easier and quicker now that we have these beautiful towels (ordered the pink unicorn, red penguin, and navy pelican). Originally, I ordered the pelican thinking it would be black. It’s shown to be dark navy but still great! They’ve held up through at least four washes each with no problems, delicate cycles with cold water and low temp. Very happy, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tristin & Ian

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, durable, just not very soft.
customer_reviews.text: I think this towel is adorable in style and matches the image pictured. We bought it for our newborn son because we wanted him to have a perfect size towel for his bath take and one that covers his head. For this purpose it’s great. My only complaint is that it isn’t very soft at all. My own towels I use I feel are softer. It held up after 4-5 washes so well, but even with fabric softener it isn’t very soft for a baby. The price could be a little lower considering the material isn’t quite as top notch as it could be as far as how it feels.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Declercq

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have 11month old twins. He's about 27 inches tall and 21 pounds. She's about 17 pounds and 26 inches tall and the towels have room to stay with them.for a bit. I bought the owl and unicorn for them. The towels are stiff when You get them. After washing they softened up quite a Bit. They're terry cloth and absorb the water super well after bathing/showering the babies. I'm usually handed a soaking wet kid and get wet as well but I didnt get wet at all with the towels. Definately recommend. Bonus theyre also super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughters visit at thanksgiving. She will be 6 months old and I wanted a hooded towel. The previous one I ordered for her shower was not available ( also a penguin, as we are avid Pittsburgh Penguin fans). It looks very cute, but not organic Cotten like the previous one I ordered. Hoping when I wash this, it soften a bit. A bit bummed as I recently saw the same towel in TJ Maxx for $7.99. Decided I did not need two of these, now wished I had waited.....oh well. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Kim P.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This towel is very cute, however as I was taking the plastic lock tags off the towel, the towel started fray and pull. Also those plastic lock tags left large puncture holes on the towel. Unfortunately, the towel is too rough for use on skin. I have no yet washed it so more damage could be noticed after wash, I am not happy with this product and would like a refund of the towel and my shipping fee please.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great size that I think he'll be able to use ...
customer_reviews.text: This towel is very cute! I bought the fox for my 5 month old son and he smiled as soon as he saw it. It's a great size that I think he'll be able to use for a couple years if it holds up that long. The towel feels nice but it is kind of thin, like a lot of baby towels and it does seem like it might be prone to unraveling. I have only had it a few weeks but it's still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Not a real towel
customer_reviews.text: It looks adorable, but the material is not like a towel. Much thiner and rougher than a real tower. A kid could wear it, but I won’t use it as a tower. I hope it It could last longer. It is just packed inside of plastic bags, which make it looks cheap. Not very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Chen

customer_reviews.title: So sad, it’s the best towel minus the defect!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give 4 stars but my towel came with a run in it! It’s sooo pretty and the softest towel ever! It’s just the right size and the unicorn is adorable! I’m super bummed with the run in it that actually is like a hole! Hoping I can get a new one but unsure! It’s seriously the cutest softest baby towel ever Update- amazon is truly amazing!! They replaced my towel! Sooooo love this towe! By far the best baby towel ever! It’s so big (unlike a lot of baby towels) and soooo soft!! I give this towel a 10 out of 10!!
customer_reviews.author: julie moser

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not soft.
customer_reviews.text: I like this in theory, but for $7-$9 and designed for a baby I thought it would be 1. Soft, & 2. Smaller. This isn't soft at all. It's cheap towel, like a beach towel. I'd pass if I were you and splurge on the super soft My Royal Baby one:
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Hart

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little rough
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these towels, but be for each of my little ones. I figured the towels would work well for my 2 and 4 year olds. We got them and used them yesterday after playing in water outside. The hoods don’t really fit their heads well, they should have been made a bit wider and with a deeper hood. The material is also kind of rough, like a cheap Walmart towel. Still cute, but not entirely what I was expecting..
customer_reviews.author: Ksmom2016

customer_reviews.title: So precious!
customer_reviews.text: This is precious! I ended up with 3 of them, one I bought, and 2 that were gifted to me from my registry. My baby is due to be here in 4 days, and I cannot wait to use these towels to wrap her in after her baths. I love the hooded towels, I used them for my kids when they were babies, and these are perfect. Nice size so they will last, and so adorable to boot. Very affordable, soft, and I’m sure they’ll hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a baby shower, and its just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Longer than the Carter’s towels but not quite as thick
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price point for picking up a couple more of these for me. I was thrilled to see that the length is a bit longer than the Carter’s ones, which is great for my growing toddler. These are just a little bit thinner but still very soft. I purposely picked out the two cheapest colors. They happen to be very cute. I would definitely buy this again if I needed more
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Cute towel, matches our bathroom decor perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable towel, really cute packaging, and does the job! We purchased this to match our nursery décor (pink/grey elephant theme) and this has been perfect to use! The fabric is really soft and I love hanging it up by her closet to match everything else. I've been careful to not use it too much, as I've seen other reviews about it falling apart faster, but I haven't had any issues as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not soft at all
customer_reviews.text: I immediately decided to return this item as soon as I feel the material. The material is so rough and I know there’s no way I want to use it on my newborn child. I ended up purchasing a towel from target and material was much better .
customer_reviews.author: Jenny q yan chen

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13-month old son that had outgrown the typical "baby hooded towels". This one is bigger, so hopefully we can use it for a while longer. The only down side I've come across so far is it does pill a bit on my son. I've washed it a few times now and it doesn't do it as bad, but definitely make sure to wash before use or you will be picking fuzz off your little babe all night.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea A

customer_reviews.title: Great towel and really cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought the elephant towel when I first found I was pregnant. This was before I found out I was having a girl. When I bought the towel, I didn't realize that the elephant has a giant pink bow on the side of one of the ears. The bow blends in with the ears. It wasn't something to worry about because even if I did have a boy, he wouldn't know nor cared if the elephant towel had a bow as an infant.
customer_reviews.author: Camara

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!! Very soft! Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: My sister absolutely loved it for my Lil newborn niece!! Gentle on her little newborn skin, very soft, and just all-around better to use than anything rough, or potentially irritating to your baby's skin. Very happy with my purchase! I will definitely be buying more of these towels for her! Thanks, amazon!(:
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent, cute, and well made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these towels. Great size for baby and they are absorbent. They wash really well and don't shrink, become misshapen, or damaged. Love that they are very cute as well. We bought our baby the elephant and then the unicorn. I would definitely purchase these as baby shower gifts. I would recommend washing twice because one wash doesn't remove all the new product lint. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Segura

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! Nice and large and easily is large enough for up to our 4 year old. Perfect for a 2 year old. Pretty soft. Overall we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Nash

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and well made! Much bigger than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is super adorable! I am currently pregnant and bought this for our daughter, when she’s born. It is MUCH bigger than I anticipated! My daughter will likely drown in it as a newborn, but she will be able to use it for MANY years to come. The material isn’t as soft as I would like, but it’s soft enough that I have no worries about using it on a newborn. It seems to be made very well, I’m only curious as to how well the bow will hold up in the wash. Time will tell. Overall, I’m extremely satisfied with my purchase and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Isn't it cute?!
customer_reviews.text: It is.....very cute. And it was very soft, until we washed it. It doesn't really absorb water very well, and became coarse after one run through the wash. great for pictures and we still use it to lay our son on to dry when we get him out of his tub, as it keeps the water off of whatever we are dressing him on. Not a waste, not expensive, not blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Biggam

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since it looked cute, but it's a very bad quality product. I hand washed it and air-dried it for the first time and it already looked like an old blanket. Second time I machine washed it per instructions and this time full of loose threads. Wish I could give negative ratings!
customer_reviews.author: Dhava

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but great
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty no doubt, but it’s so lightweight that almost takes away from its absorbency. I will update my review as I use it for my little one Update: I’m in love with it and it absorbs perfectly. It’s lightweight makes it dry quickly after laundry too and it leaves minimal lint on his body, compared to other towels we’ve tried . Baby loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ejiro Ogumor

customer_reviews.title: Adorable towel and my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We have the hudson baby security blanket and the matching onesies with the blue owl on it. I was extremely excited to see the had a towel with the same blue owl!!! My son recognized it and he got excited. It's a nice terry cloth fabric and very absorbent!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Towels
customer_reviews.text: We love these towels!! We have had a great experience with all of these- they’re soft, durable and adorable! My favorite part is that they are big enough for my toddler! A lot of the hooded towels seemed to get too small for her around the age of 1- she’s 2 1/2 and I bet these will be long enough to fit her for at least another year- if not more!
customer_reviews.author: MNels

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not soft
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hooded towel for my daughter (currently 7 months). It’s cute, but it’s a bit scratchy. It’s not so scratchy that it’s unusable, but it’s not something I’d recommend or buy again. Not worth going through the hassle to return. This will be the towel we use when I’m behind on her laundry and don’t have other options.
customer_reviews.author: Araina

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: This towel is so cute. I got the elephant and I can't believe the price. I bought a smaller one for my daughter at the store years ago for almost three times the price of this one. I have washed it and it still looks great. My son can use this for a while it is a good size and seems to be great quality. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: alexandra richeson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged but still cute!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is absolutely adorable! We bought this for a newborn to hopefully wear for a while. Unfortunately, it came with a small hole under the hood, so that’s the only reason why we gave it 4 stars. :( Other than that, it’s everything we wanted. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: ZumbaMommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: So this is the 2nd towel I have from this company and I LOVE THEM! They’re so much bigger than the usual towels you get as gifts. They’re also thicker!!!!!! I absolutely love them and they cover my 14 month old perfectly and she’s big for her age. It fires quickly AND after many many washes, the shape, color, and fuzz stays on everytime ! I love these towels
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Thin material and not sure it will last long
customer_reviews.text: When I was cutting the tags off, one of the plastic tabs snagged the fabric. If that happened right out of the package I'm not sure how well it will hold up over time! It's cute and the size is great so I'm hoping to get some use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart after first wash
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but threads started coming out and the owl character was separating from the towel after first wash. I'm disappointed, but the towel is nice and absorbent, so maybe I will try to fix the loose part by hand.
customer_reviews.author: H N

customer_reviews.title: It's adorable I use it a lot but I do own ...
customer_reviews.text: It's adorable I use it a lot but I do own four other baby towels and this is the roughest one I have.. not very soft specially for a baby's skin, (I have a toddler so it's not too big of a deal) but if I had a newborn I would nevertheless use this
customer_reviews.author: anaisa perez

customer_reviews.title: Attractive hooded towel!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a free gift when someone purchased a gift off of my baby registry. For some reason, the first one didn't make it to my house. I just pressed an option that "item was not received" and I got another sent to me free of charge. Happy customer here. Cute towel!
customer_reviews.author: Aila

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for newborn
customer_reviews.text: I had to bath my 2 weeks old after drying him in this towel because it left blue stain on his skin ( it was so hectic to shower him the first time and then I had to do it one more time I used a cotton blanket Ps let me just tell you I wasn’t a happy mama with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Sizable hooded towel
customer_reviews.text: I love these Hudson hooded towels as they are nice and large so that I could wrap my LO after bathing without having to wrestle for more real estate. It absorbs rather well and the little spirit animals on top are just adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping the towel would be wider
customer_reviews.text: My toddler was a little disappointed with the towel which is why I gave it 4 stars. The towel is not quite wide enough to wrap around her completely. She was not able to wear the towel tied around her and pretend to me a monkey. The towel would not stay in place. 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but the glasses are kind of odd and you can tell this is cheaply made. Probably should have assumed that for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steph-o

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and thick
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel.. it's quite but big in size and beautiful too.. its cotton made so would be good for soaking after baby bath.. I hope my baby would use it upto 2 years . The cute design on the hood is very adorable..
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute and soft. I just love the fancy walrus design. Came on a hanger with a ribbon wrapped around it, great for a baby shower gift. The towel itself is huge! We'll get a lot of use out of it. Not quite as thick as an adult towel, but not thin like those super-cheap hooded towels that instantly pill. I think it's a good thickness for baby, and absorbent! Great deal, great towel.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Towel is perfect for my 3 y.o.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a towel for my 3yo. Wasn’t too sure if to get this or not because I saw it was for babies. Then I read the reviews and I’m glad I did. This towel is huge! I’m glad I bought it. She loves it! Looks exactly like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hooded elephant towel for a baby gift & it was enthusiastically received (and used). Adorable, beautifully-made and sturdy. I will be buying more to send as gifts in the future. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jenkins, author of "Scandalon"

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Perfect towels!
customer_reviews.text: Love how soft these are as well as how thick the material is. The other baby towels I was gifted are super thin. They don’t keep baby warm after getting out of a bath. These towels are also small enough for an infant but definitely big enough to continue using when he is a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Krug

customer_reviews.title: The only hooded towels we will use!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and adorable!! These are the only hooded towels we will use from now on. At first we just got the elephant, then came back and got the whale one (which is my personal favorite!). We plan on ordering the flamingo too!
customer_reviews.author: CasRy

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous about buying this at first but I was surprised, it’s a really nice bath towel. It’s soft, absorbent, easy to clean and my son loves it. I’ll probably buy another in the future💕
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: the lamb!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo cute. The lamb is the best, but we also bought the duckie. I love these, my daughter loves these, and we have used them from infancy until 2 years. We will use them until she grows completely out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality 😊
customer_reviews.text: It’s very soft and looks like gorgeous 🥰. I like that towel. Update, I bought it again 😁. It’s really cool. I usually used for kids 2 towels, for bath 🛁 and pool. It’s soft. Definitely I recommend it for baby😊
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun towels!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these animal hooded towels. She had 2 since birth and now it was time for more. This towel is super soft and fun. Very absorbent and dries quickly. I purchased 5 different animals!! They are also quite durable and not flimsy or cheap looking. Will definitely recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Kisscake

customer_reviews.title: Friend's baby adored this! Also makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I knew everyone was going to buy baby clothes or books for the party so I wanted something more practical. A bath set with this would be great, but the towels themselves are adorable and durable. (Especially for toddlers). I wish this came in adult size as well it's so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Liss

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is absolutely adorable but when I would go to put lotion on my baby i would notice that the towel left behind a bunch of material. Will not buy again. I decided to tear these up and just make some burp clothes with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Perdomo

customer_reviews.title: Great length & price!
customer_reviews.text: This is TOO cute! My daughter is 16 months and about 23 pounds and it fits her GREAT! Even some room for her to grow in which is a plus. A lot seem to be small but this one is awesome in length, softness and cuteness!!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: I hoped with all of the great reviews this would be a great purchase, but boy was I wrong. It is cute, but the quality is terrible. Very thin, not soft, and many unwoven threads, right out of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer pool days
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute! Not the softest or thickest material but I used it to throw over my 3 year old after getting out of the pool and it works perfect and she loved the hood. I got the light pink unicorn and definitely very cute. Will be buying different ones for future pool days
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous item!
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I got this item as a gift to my baby niece, It was beautiful and bigger than what it looks like on the photo online! My sister in law really liked it too! I recommed it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother. Spend a few more bucks and get better quality
customer_reviews.text: I washed it right when I received it with other towels I bought before our babies arrival, this towel filled the rest of my baby towels with lint and itself has lint all over it. For not even using it yet this was a horrible purchase. Very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great size, cute design
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t describe this towel as soft, as I have other baby towels that are much softer. However, the texture is what I was looking for in a towel and it dries my baby off better than if I were to use a soft towel. The color is cute and design is exactly as pictured. I know I will be using this towel for my son from infancy to toddler years since it is a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Kaili

customer_reviews.title: Hands down- the BEST baby towels
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the average baby towel is the equivalent of a one ply piece of toilet paper. It doesn’t absorb and it’s not very successful at drying a baby off. They’re also extremely small. These towels are super cute, will grow with your child, and actually dry your baby off! 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Better then I was expecting 👏🏽
customer_reviews.text: These towels are adorable & much better then I was expecting. I almost didn’t get them because I already have more then enough but figured “why not” and I’m so glad I did. I might even buy more cause I really quite like them. I haven’t used them yet cause I’m still pregnant but I am impressed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tella

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and cute design. I bought a gerber from walmart earlier and it was so poor quality towel. But this is the best and price is great and so many choices to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Rishi

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these towels, they are all very well made and sturdy. Even my bigger kids love them. The gray elephant ones are kind of dingy looking though, I wish the gray was a richer gray. The white ones are a good pure white. The elephants and giraffe are all very cute
customer_reviews.author: SharonGill2357

customer_reviews.title: Love Fox Things
customer_reviews.text: I love fox things so I bought this towel. It says unisex but it appears more geared towards boys in my opinion, but I"m sure girls would love it too. It's super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra W

customer_reviews.title: Nice towel for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is big enough to cover my 3 month old daughter and there is still room to grow. Some of the other towels that I've bought are too soft and don't dry her off but this one does the job. I will be buying more of these towels just different animals so she has a variety
customer_reviews.author: ENehez

customer_reviews.title: Not sized for infants
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and feels like an adult towel in texture, however, I took a star off because it's not a towel for an infant; rather a toddler . Keeping it though, because my son can use it for many years and it's still very adorable .
customer_reviews.author: Succulents

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two- one for granddaughter and one for grand niece who will be here in April. After giving it to the expectant family found out baby’s nursery will be elephant themed!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Adorable...
customer_reviews.text: I collect elephants and just couldn't pass this one up as a baby gift. I believe she actually received two and will be keeping them both. Just darling.
customer_reviews.author: barbjvan

customer_reviews.title: This is super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute!! Perfect size for my growing 2 year old. The unicorn looks is even better in person than on line. The towel is thin, similar to the towels at Walmart or the cheaper towels at target but it’s fine for getting the kids out of the tub and wrapping them up. Color is a true bright pink.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanmarie Schulman

customer_reviews.title: very thin
customer_reviews.text: It seems retailers are saving more by cutting weight (making thin) once product receives good reviews. but it will still same product, dimensions (thickness is reducing). I saw same with some other product. and 33*33 size is small for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Towel fell apart on first wash. I checked the care instructions on tag and it even says to wash before first use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased multiple types of towels for my toddler twin girls over the years. But this one is by far, the softest. It has lasted through several washes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeswin Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and usable.
customer_reviews.text: Absorbent, cute, didn't fall apart in the wash, big enough and soft enough. From the reviews I expected it to be super soft and it wasn't. It's soft enough though. I don't think it'd be as absorbent if it was made out of a softer material really. I received some as gifts and they were too rough so I bought this one. Very glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was sent the wrong item, but seller was quick to fix the error. My baby loves this towel. It looks so precious and it is nice and soft for her sensitive skin even after washing multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6 moth olds fav towel!! we've been using it off and on with her since birth but she absolutely loves it! waaay better than the usual thin baby towels. this has the thickness of regular towels and is soo cute! Perfect gift for a baby shower. any mom would enjoy the quality of this towel!!
customer_reviews.author: sosophisticatedvi

customer_reviews.title: Not very soft
customer_reviews.text: Not very soft for being a baby towel. Feels like a regular towel you can buy at Walmart when it comes to softness. Not impressed with the quality, design is very cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, soft and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design and good quality towel. Good size for an infant. The absorbency could be better but it’s not bad either. Love the color and design. One of the must haves for newborns. Makes bath time easier.
customer_reviews.author: Nayab Ali Kazmi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is big enough for my big boy, who just turned 1 but is the height and weight of a 2 year old. He giggles when he looks in the mirror with his elephant hood
customer_reviews.author: Hello Woofy

customer_reviews.title: Came with pink stain from wrapping ribbon
customer_reviews.text: It came wrapped around with red ribbon and the two sides the ribbon touched were stained pink. Definitely not a giftable presentation. I threw away the plastic packaging so won’t be able to return it. I’m not sure if it will come off but I hope this doesn’t stain other stuff in laundering. It’s a bit thinner than my other hooded towels but I don’t mind that cuz the thick ones don’t dry well in the dryer. I just wish it came without the pink stain.
customer_reviews.author: Sang Choi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift - from an aunt!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, it’s soft and parents will also love it. This is something parent may not buy as it’s totally not necessary but very nice to have as a gift.!
customer_reviews.author: ItzLetz

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Large towel, I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This towel is just what I was looking for. It’s nice and large, with room for my son to grow and it’s pretty soft. It’s much thicker than I expected it to be. I’m very happy with it, thinking of getting another one. I recommend it if you’re looking for a large towel like I was. Only thing, it did shrink noticeably After I washed and dried it before use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and soft!
customer_reviews.text: At first, it was a gift from my friend. I bought a bath towel in the shape of a deer. I thought it was pretty good. It was very comfortable and soft. Then I found out that the price was very cheap when I was doing the activity. So I started. The bath towel is lovely and well made, which is suitable for boys!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Seem decent!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these towels in various patterns.. the sailor bear, nerdy fox, and elephant. They all came packaged nicely. I haven't had the chance to wash or use them yet. But they seem like they will hold up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cute for your Baby or as Baby Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and is very cute. I think it would make a great baby shower gift that is cute and trendy - I would have liked it if I received it. It looks like it will hold up well, but I will have to update review after more use. I only gave 4 stars for comfort as there are softer towels out there, but it is soft enough to use on my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Marzigliano

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the best for functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Cute towel but after a while I realized that the face is just annoying. A plain one would be easier to wipe baby’s head. But if you’re looking for a good towel that’s cute with a face then these work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Not soft enough
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and cute but the price is little higher. And it’s not soft enough. I saw a similar one in Marshall and it’s only 7.99
customer_reviews.author: Peipei

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cute towel for my new niece...and this little cutie is just what I wanted! She looks like a soft little bundle of cuteness...mission accomplished!
customer_reviews.author: BkDiva

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I was worried the giraffes face might be too stiff and not sit well on my daughters head. I was wrong! It’s very soft and flexible. We love this towel and would order it again. I gave the light weight 4 stars because I wouldn’t call it light weight or heavy , it’s actually the perfect thickness for a 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Stoked!

customer_reviews.title: Love the navy color!
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels and I’ve gotten two of them in the past for my daughter, but now I am pregnant with a boy and I ordered two for him! I am so pleasantly surprised by the color! I thought this “Modern Bear” one was going to be black, but I honestly love the navy more. I love the plaid accents on it because it goes with his theme.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kate

customer_reviews.title: Adorable towels
customer_reviews.text: These towels are great ! Not only are they adorable but they are a great size for baby to grow into. They are very absorbing and I’m so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Product was torn
customer_reviews.text: I had some torn up part so I returned it. It looks pretty for taking baby pictures. Great absorbency but not so soft. Felt a bit harsh for baby I’d say. It’s huge to wrap the baby completely in winters though .
customer_reviews.author: Zahra

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not soft.
customer_reviews.text: This is cute. I like seeing animals in glasses because my kids wear them. My child likes the towel. I don’t think it’s very soft but it works for drying
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cute. My baby laughs every time she sees it. Soft. Not way too soft. But that’s how I like towels to be. It dries fast too. So it’s easier to distract her and dry her up at the same time. Added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This towel is awesome! I love the size of it
customer_reviews.text: This towel is awesome! I love the size of it, perfect for my 4 year old, and the unicorn design. My daughter fell in love with it. While it's hood is located in a corner, thus making one end of the towel longer than the other, it's big enough (for now) that it doesn't annoy her. Thanks for the great deal on a unicorn towel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs water immediately
customer_reviews.text: This towel absorbs water well. I wrap my little one in this right after a bath and she is dry. But I was expecting the towel to be a little more softer. Being a baby towel, It is not even as soft as the colored towels we find in bed bath and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Subha

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Body is soft but the hood part, where the face is, has a rough patch on the back. Could use a different fabric on the back of the faces embroidery to make it better.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Absorbent Towel
customer_reviews.text: So absorbent and cute. I love this towel. I wish it came in a set. I would definitely recommend buying this for your little one. It keeps her warm from those fun baths and covers her little head way better than the typical baby towels. A definite must buy
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Prime

product_meta.title: Hudson Baby Unisex Baby Cotton Animal Face Hooded Towel, Pretty Elephant, One Size
product_meta.description: Size:One Size| Color:Pretty ElephantHudson Baby animal face hooded towels are made of 100% woven cotton terry and are available in a variety of adorable animal face options. Our hooded towels are more than generously sized at 33x33 inches to cover baby head to toe after bath or swim time. Our fun designs and large towels are perfect for baby and toddlers.
feature_bullets: Adorably detailed animal face on hood
Soft and gentle on baby's skin

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars6,866 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
